Underline titles with punctuation¶

For subtitles, switch to another punctuation mark¶

Italic bold name function() expression = 3 + 3 Hyperlink `Link`_ .. _Link: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Link_(The_Legend_of_Zelda) .. image:: images/python-logo.png .. A comment block starts with two periods, can continue indented. A paragraph is one or more lines of un-indented text, separated from the material above and below by blank lines. “Block quotes look like paragraphs, but are indented with one or more spaces.” | Because of the pipe characters, this will become one line, | And this will become another line, like in poetry. term Definition for the “term”, indented beneath it. another term And its definition; any of these definitions can continue on for several lines by – you guessed it! – being similarly indented. * Each item in a list starts with an asterisk (or “1.”, “a.”, etc). * List items can go on for several lines as long as you remember to
